docs.instructions:
ClueWeb22 is available by hard drives from the Carnegie Mellon University here: <https://lemurproject.org/clueweb22/obtain.php>
More details about the procedure can be found here: <https://ir-datasets.com/clueweb22.html#DataAccess>.
Link the ClueWeb22 source files here: {path}
Should contain directories like 'html', 'inlink', 'outlink', 'txt', 'jpg', and/or 'vdom'.
